Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: Unit tests fail in fabric-unit-test-daily-master-x86_64 CI job due to a panic error
Issue.description: DEBU 1d0 constructing CouchDB VersionedDBProvider 00:15:24 unit-tests_1 | panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference 00:15:24 unit-tests_1 | signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x8 pc=0xd55fd2 00:15:24 unit-tests_1 | FAIL github.com/hyperledger/fabric/core/ledger/kvledger/txmgmt/txmgr/lockbasedtxmgr 3.975s 00:15:24 unit-tests_1 | ? github.com/hyperledger/fabric/core/ledger/kvledger/txmgmt/validator no test files {code} *fabric Commit: d34b43f* *Build Log* https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-unit-test-daily-master-x86_64/42/ >
